value.title: Announcing improved MDX query performance in Power BI
value.excerpt: With a recent update of the Analysis Services Tabular engine in Power BI, Multidimensional Expressions (MDX) clients, such as Microsoft Excel, can now enjoy improved query performance against datasets in Power BI.
